name: Global Aviation Alliance
overview: Global Aviation Alliance, Inc. provides access to value added offerings for services utilized by aviation professionals in the United States and internationally. It offers an integrated solution that provides its clients with access to discount pilot and mechanic training, aircraft brokerage, aviation legal services, and temporary crew solutions. The company, through its professional employment organization partner, also provides human resources support, risk management and workplace safety, benefits administration, payroll processing, employment tax compliance and reporting, online employee and payroll information and reports, federal/state/local regulations compliance assistance, online human resource forms, employee-related policies and procedures, and workersâ€™ compensation compliance services, as well as employee benefits and administration programs. In addition, it offers discount vendor services, crew products and accessories, email alerts regarding training events, and access to a pilot logbook application. Global Aviation Alliance, Inc. was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Anthem, Arizona.
